name: Enchanted Dagger
description: A small, enchanted dagger that glows with a faint blue light. It is said to carry a curse.
looks: The dagger has a slim, silver blade and a hilt wrapped in black leather. The blade emits a faint blue glow.

special_weapon_skills.Dagger Mastery: Increases damage done with daggers by 20%

special_effects.Curse of the Shadows: When attacking, there is a chance to inflict darkness and reduce the target's accuracy by 10% for 5 seconds.

name: Mighty Sword
description: A powerful sword that radiates strength and cuts through enemies with ease.
looks: The sword has a long, silver blade with intricate engravings. The hilt is made of polished wood and adorned with a gemstone.

special_effects.Critical Strike: Has a chance to deal extra damage on a critical hit.

name: Fireball Scroll
description: A scroll containing the spell Fireball, which conjures a ball of fire that explodes upon impact.
looks: The scroll is made of aged parchment and is sealed with a wax stamp depicting a fiery symbol.

special_effects.exploding: On impact, the Fireball explodes, damaging all nearby enemies.

name: Iron Sword
description: A basic sword made of iron.
looks: The sword has a straight blade and an ornate hilt.

name: Invisibility Potion
description: A potion that grants the user temporary invisibility.
looks: The potion is a small, clear glass vial filled with a transparent liquid.

special_effects.Invisibility: Temporarily makes the user invisible to others.

name: Healing Salve
description: A salve that heals minor wounds and restores health.
looks: The salve is a small jar filled with a pale green ointment.

name: Studded Leather Armor
description: A set of studded leather armor that offers moderate protection.
looks: The armor is made from leather with metal studs scattered across the surface.

name: Poisoned Dagger
description: A small dagger coated with a deadly poison.
looks: The dagger has a short blade made of black metal. The hilt is wrapped in a dark green leather for better grip.

special_weapon_skils.backstab: Allows the wielder to perform a powerful backstab attack
special_weapon_skils.poison_smoke: Creates a cloud of poisonous smoke upon attack

special_effects.poison_damage: Causes the target to take additional poison damage over time
special_effects.ignore_armor: Ignores a portion of the target's armor for damage calculation

name: Titanium Sword
description: A powerful sword made from titanium alloy.
looks: The sword has a silver blade with a hilt made from black leather.

special_effects.critical_strike: Has a chance to deal double damage.
